solution_line_template: The total number of the candies is {mark_candies} + {peter_candies} + {john_candies} = <<{mark_candies}+{peter_candies}+{john_candies}={total_candies}>>{total_candies}.
When the candies are shared equally each one will get {total_candies} / {number_of_people} = <<{total_candies}/{number_of_people}={candies_per_person}>>{candies_per_person}.
